synopsis.text: Tokyo-raised Natsuno Hanabi returns to her hometown for high school, eager to begin a new chapter in her life. She anticipates a luxurious stay at Tachibanakan, a mansion-style dormitory for girls. However, her expectations are shattered when she discovers that Tachibanakan is actually a simple, traditional Japanese dormitory. Upon her arrival, she encounters a captivating, naked stranger and reconnects with her estranged childhood friend, Konomi Fujiwara. As Hanabi acclimates to her new environment, she quickly becomes the center of attention among the dorm's residents, who vie for her affection. Navigating this unexpected love triangle, Hanabi realizes that her high school experience will be anything but ordinary.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
